headline: Does Alexandria Real Estate Equities (ARE) Dividend Cut Mark a Turning Point for Its Life Science REIT Model?
summary: Alexandria Real Estate Equities, Inc. has cut its dividend by 45%, faces multiple securities class action lawsuits tied to a large impairment at its Long Island City property, and recently elevated John Hart Cole to Co-President & Co-Regional Market Director Seattle. These developments highlight mounting pressure on Alexandria’s life science REIT model, as sector headwinds, balance sheet preservation, and legal scrutiny intersect with leadership changes. We’ll now examine how the dividend...
